Class Robot

  • java.lang.Object
    • Cell
      • Character
        • Robot
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExplodingRobot, SmartRobot

    public class Robot
extends Character
    Class to represet robots (non-player characters)

      • collideWith

        public Cell collideWith(Cell c,
                        Tableau t)
        TODO: Handles collisions of the robot with another cell. This is the default collideWith method. If something is in the cell, the robot is removed and the cell is hit. The content of the cell after the collision is returned.
        Specified by:
        collideWith in class Character
        Parameters:
        c - The cell to collide with
        t - The tableau
        Returns:
        The value to be placed in the cell after the collision

      • getZapped

        public boolean getZapped()
        Handles the situation where a Cell is zapped (by a ray or an exploding robot). Zapping vaporizes (no rubble) everything except PermanentRock (which isn't effected. Returns true if and only if the value of the cell should be changed to null.
        Specified by:
        getZapped in class Cell
        Returns:
        Whether or not the cell should be nullified

      • getHit

        public Cell getHit(Tableau t,
                   Robot by)
        TODO: Handles the situation where a Cell is hit by a (non-exploding) robot. Getting hit will leave rock or rubble if cell was rock or rubble, will leave rubble if cell was a robot. Will cause an explosion if cell is exploding robot. Returns the value that should be placed in cell after hit.
        Specified by:
        getHit in class Cell
        Parameters:
        by - The thing doing the hitting
        t - The tableau
        Returns:
        New value for cell

      • removable

        public boolean removable()
        Signals whether or not a cell can be removed (from Tableau's robot list). Robots return true; everything else false. The PC should be marked dead.
        Overrides:
        removable in class Cell
        Returns:
        false

      • moveTo

        public Pair moveTo(Tableau t)
        TODO: Finds a new position for the moving robot. Robots move toward the PC. "Toward the PC" means that the robot moves in the direction of the PC in at least one dimension, and if possible, it moves toward the PC in both dimensions.
        Specified by:
        moveTo in class Character
        Parameters:
        t - The tableau
        Returns:
        The new position
